targets.rawSql:
select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '20 seconds' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Quantidade por hora" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.id = '1' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
-- $__timeFilter("time") and 
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time asc
limit 13

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nmCliente' as "Cliente"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'cor' as "Cor"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select time, sum(value) as "Contagem de peles"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1'
and mada.sensor_type = '01'
and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "Número da ordem de produção"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

SELECT extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc
limit 1

select (select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 1 and state in ('5','4') and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as UpTime,
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = 1 and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as AllTime from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'espessuraFinal' as "Espessura Final"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT mada.time, mada.extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Descrição Evento Parada"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '24 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc

select (select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and state in ('5') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running with P.O",
(select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and state in ('4') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running without P.O",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and state in ('3') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Stopped machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and state in ('2') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Idle machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and state in ('1','0') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Offline",
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Total time" from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where $__timeFilter(time) and mach.id = '1' 
--where mach.description = '$maquina' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '7d' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "QTD de peles" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.id = '1' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
and $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time desc

select time,
extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "P.O",
extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo",
extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Paradas"
from machines_data md 
inner join machines mach on md.machine_id = mach.id
where $__timeFilter(time) and mach.id = '1'
order by time asc

/*select mast.time,
mada.extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "OP",
mada.extra_data ->> 'nmCliente' as "Cliente",
mada.extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo",
mada.extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Paradas"
from machines_state mast
inner join machines_data mada on mada.machine_id = mast.machine_id
inner join machines mach on mach.id = mast.machine_id 
where $__timeFilter(mast.time) and mach.description = '$maquina' 
order by mast.time desc*/

panels.title: Linha do tempo da máquina: Vácuo MecMan

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and sensor_id = 5 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and sensor_id = 5 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and sensor_id = 7 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, value
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and sensor_id = 8 and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select time, (value) as "Vácuo"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1'
and mada.sensor_type = '06'
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select time, value as "Vácuo"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and mada.value between 100 and 500 
and mada.sensor_type = '06'
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

panels.title: Histograma vácuo (acima de 100 e abaixo de 640)

targets.rawSql:
select max(value) from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 1 and mada.value between 100 and 500
and sensor_type = '06'  and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Pressão de vácuo máxima atingida no período

targets.rawSql:
select avg(value) from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 1 and mada.value between 100 and 500
and sensor_type = '06' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Média da pressão de vácuo atingida no período

targets.rawSql:
select (max(value) - min(value)) as amplitude from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '06' and mada.value between 100 and 500 and $__timeFilter(time)

select cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2)) stddevsamp
 from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 1 and mada.value between 100 and 500
and sensor_type = '06' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Desvio padrão da amostra no período

targets.rawSql:
select 500/(6* cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2))) stddevsamp
 from machines_data mada
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '06'  and mada.value between 100 and 500
and $__timeFilter(time)

select time, value as "Temperatura"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1'
and mada.sensor_type = '02'
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select time, value as "Temperatura"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.id = '1' and mada.value > 25
and mada.sensor_type = '02'
and $__timeFilter(time)
order by time desc

select max(value) from machines_data md
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

select avg(value) from machines_data md
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Média da temperatura atingida no período

targets.rawSql:
select (max(value) - min(value)) as amplitude from machines_data md
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

select cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2)) stddevsamp
 from machines_data md
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)

panels.title: Desvio padrão da amostra no período

targets.rawSql:
select 5/(6* cast(stddev_samp(value) as dec(14,2))) stddevsamp
 from machines_data md
where machine_id = 1 and sensor_type = '02' and $__timeFilter(time)
